title: In Conversation with Noam Chomsky on United States Foreign Affairs
description:
In this interview, London Politica's research analyst Alessia Mazuelos sits down with Professor Noam Chomsky on US foreign affairs. From the US's involvement in Afghanistan, to Ukraine, and a potential "China Threat", Professor Chomsky offers refreshing views on the future of the US and its relations with the rest of the emerging global powers.

Link to Alessia's article based on the interview:
